original_text: And as Jesus reclined at table in the house, behold, many tax collectors and sinners came and were reclining with Jesus and his disciples.
korean_text: 예수께서 마태의 집에서 앉아 음식을 잡수실 때에 많은 세리와 죄인들이 와서 예수와 그의 제자들과 함께 앉았더니

sentences.original_text: And as Jesus reclined at table in the house
sentences.korean_translation: 예수께서 집에서 식탁에 앉아 계실 때에

sentences.original_text: many tax collectors and sinners came
and were reclining with Jesus and his disciples.
sentences.korean_translation: 예수와 그의 제자들과 함께 앉아 있었다.
